title: ESE 2020 System Status
description: Displays the system status of the various services used for the First Semester Introduction 2020 at the TU Dresden.

matrix.title: Matrix Server
matrix.description: Matrix Server of the iFSR that can be used to get in touch with the FSR or chat as large group.

bbb.description: Open Source Web Conference Tool hosted by the AG DSN.

kurse.title: Course System
